entities.name: severus
entities.description: Severus is mentioned as the one who knows he ought not to be there and has been told to say nothing to anyone. He is also referred to by Bellatrix as 'you'.

entities.name: bellatrix
entities.description: Bellatrix is introduced as someone who snarls at Severus and does not trust him. She is also the one who has something she wants to say.

entities.name: narcissa
entities.description: Narcissa lets out a noise that might have been a dry sob and covers her face with her hands when Bellatrix speaks. She is also referred to by Snape as 'we'.

entities.name: snape
entities.description: Snape is introduced as someone who sets his glass down upon the table and sits back again, smiling into Bellatrix's glowering face. He also asks Narcissa to hear what Bellatrix has to say.

relationships.description: Bellatrix does not trust Snape, as she says 'I don't trust you, Snape, as you very well know!'
Severus has a conversation with Bellatrix, where he asks her why she does not trust him.
